original_title: Playmobil: Guardians of the Dragon Fires
overview: For many years, the Dragon Guardians have been watching over the sacred fires of the ancient dragons Remur and Raganur.  Then, the greedy warrior, Dragon, steals the fire of Remur and captures one of the guardians.  An exciting rescue begins...
title: Playmobil: Guardians of the Dragon Fires
